thread.title: Monmouth names James, Jones, Hornbeak, Robinson as captains
thread.title_full: Monmouth names James, Jones, Hornbeak, Robinson as captains

author: app.com
title: Monmouth names James, Jones, Hornbeak, Robinson as captains
text:
MORE WEST LONG BRANCH – A point guard under late, legendary University of North Carolina head coach Dean Smith from 1987-91, King Rice has tried to incorporate bits and pieces of Smith’s Tar Heels into his Monmouth University teams, and that includes how he goes about choosing his captains.
Rice has referenced ‘The Carolina Way’ countless times and when it comes to captaincy, it goes to seniors, which means guys who have been in the program for a while who understand what the coaches want and what is expected.
Last season, Rice had three scholarship seniors, Max DiLeo, Andrew Nicholas and Brice Kofane. DiLeo and Nicholas were four-year Hawks, while Kofane was a fifth-year senior who spent his first four years at Providence. That made for easy selections as captains, but this season, the only senior on the roster is fifth-year guard Deon Jones.
